ethanin pasu baba wanga nindata watunu athara owunge sanwadaya awasan wiya. 1996 di aya miya giyaya.age anawaki kisiwak prakashanaya wi nomathi athara edga kesi ha nosthradamus wannanta labunu prasiddhiya ayata nolabuni. 2018-2013–chinaya lokaye balawath rata bawata path weyi.pruthuwi kakshaya swalpa washayen wenas wimak sidu weyi. 2025-2028–nawa bala shakthi mulayak nirmanaya kere.kusaginna yatapath kirimata hakiyawa labe.minisun sahitha abhyawakasha yanayak sikuru wetha gaman kere. 2033-2045–drawa ayis diya wemin pawathi.yuropaya palanaya karanne muslim warun wisini. 2049-2070–indriyan nishpadanaya kirimata puluwana.thibena siruru wenuwata wenath sirurak bhawithayata ganima hodama prathikara kramayak bawata path we. 2088-2167–nawa rogayak.miniththu kihipayakin wayasgatha wima.pruthuwiye aduru paththa kruthima suryayeku wisin eliya kirima.minisun jiwath wana robowaru bawata path we.hangeriyawata abhyawakashayen sangnya labe.diya yata janapada,sathun ardha manushyan bawata path we. 2170-2259–pradhana niyagayak.agaharu matha thibena janapadayak nyashtika balayak bawata path wi pruthuwiyen nidahasa laba ganimata aragala karayi. 2262-2304–grahaloka akhandawa kaksha wenas karanu atha.kalaye aapassata gaman kala hakiya.pitaskawalayan samaga nawa hadunmkam.hiru sisil weyi.eya nawatha pana ganwimata uthsaha kerenu atha.guruthwa balaya wenas wanu atha.parani abhyawakasha madhyasthana ha chandrika kadan watenu atha.wishwaye rahas ha wadagath nethi heli we.chandrayage rahas heli weyi. 2341-3805–abhyawakashayen kisiyam bhayanaka deyak pruthuwiyata laga weyi.kruthima suryayan dedenekuge gatima.pruthuwiya wata duhuwili kalapayak.ee wana wita pruthuwiye jiwaya miya gos atha.eheth manawa wargaya wenath sauragraha mandalayaka nawathan ganimata padanama damayi.
